dessert_cheesecake.name: New York Cheesecake
dessert_cheesecake.short: Creamy cheesecake with vanilla and berries.
dessert_cheesecake.description: A creamy New York cheesecake with a fine hint of vanilla, served with fresh berry sauce. A rich and elegant dessert classic.

dessert_tiramisu.name: Tiramisu
dessert_tiramisu.short: Italian classic with mascarpone and espresso.
dessert_tiramisu.description: Original Italian tiramisu with creamy mascarpone, strong espresso and soft ladyfingers layered to perfection.

dessert_choco_fondant.name: Chocolate Fondant
dessert_choco_fondant.short: Warm chocolate cake with molten center.
dessert_choco_fondant.description: Warm chocolate fondant with a soft, molten core. Served with vanilla ice cream for an irresistible contrast.

dessert_panna_cotta.name: Panna Cotta
dessert_panna_cotta.short: Classic Italian cream dessert with berries.
dessert_panna_cotta.description: Traditional Italian panna cotta made from sweet cream and finished with a fruity berry sauce.

dessert_icecream_mix.name: Ice Cream Trio
dessert_icecream_mix.short: Three ice cream flavors of your choice.
dessert_icecream_mix.description: A trio of three ice cream flavors of your choice. Creamy, refreshing and ideal after any meal.

dessert_creme_brulee.name: Crème Brûlée
dessert_creme_brulee.description: Classic French crème brûlée with a perfectly caramelized sugar crust and silky vanilla cream underneath.
